titles.title: A bill to amend the Food and Nutrition Act of 2008 to exempt discounting food from the equal treatment requirement during a government shutdown, and for other purposes.
A bill to amend the Food and Nutrition Act of 2008 to exempt discounting food from the equal treatment requirement during a government shutdown, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry.
